title: Pierre Omidyar
added: He has bankrolled groups like the anti-monopoly think tank Open Markets Institute and the digital rights group Public Knowledge, in the fight against the big tech companies, which he criticizes as overly powerful and destructive to democracy.  His advocacy and investment group Omidyar Network distributed widely read papers laying out the antitrust cases against Facebook and Google.<ref>{{Cite news|last=Birnbaum|first=Emily|date=20 October 2021|title=The Tech Billionaire Aiding the Facebook-Whistleblower|work=[[Politico]]|url=https://www.politico.com/news/2021/10/20/tech-billionaire-aiding-facebook-whistleblower-516358}}</ref>

title: Pierre Omidyar
added: He has bankrolled groups like the anti-monopoly think tank [[Open Markets Institute]] and the digital rights group [[Public Knowledge Project]], in the fight against the[[Big Tech|big tech]]companies, which he criticizes as overly powerful and destructive to democracy.
